ledgerConnectionPreferenceDescription.description: A description that appears above a dropdown where users can select between up to three options - Ledger Live, U2F or WebHID - depending on what is supported in their browser. $1 is the recommended browser option, it will be either WebHID or U2f. $2 is a link to an article where users can learn more, but will be the translation of the learnMore message.

secretPhrase.message: 只有這個錢包上的第一個帳戶將自動載入。 完成此流程後，點擊下選單，然後選擇創建賬戶。

secretPhraseWarning.message: 如果您使用另一個賬戶助記詞來還原，您當前的錢包、帳戶和資產將永久從這個應用中移除。 此操作不能取消。
